techmeme.title: Netflix reports Q4 revenue of $10.2B, up 16% YoY, an operating income of $2.3B, and 301.6M global subs, adding 18.9M subs, more than doubling Wall St. estimates (Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg)
Perplexity debuts Sonar, an API service to let devs build AI search tools into their apps, with a base tier costing $5/1K searches and a pricier Sonar Pro tier (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Sources: Meta aims to debut glasses with a built-in display and new Oakley-branded smart glasses for athletes in 2025; it has resumed work on watches, earbuds (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Apple says installing macOS Sequoia 15.3, iOS 18.3, or iPadOS 18.3 will turn on Apple Intelligence automatically on compatible devices; users can opt out later (Juli Clover/MacRumors)
Meta says it will offer eligible TikTok creators free verification, content deals, and up to $5,000 in bonuses to post Reels (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
